title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.21 - Inspections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.21 - Inspections

State Regulations

The permit-issuing official and his/her designated representatives shall have the right of entrance and inspection of any spray ground facility as authorized under section
1.11
of this Title. The most recent report of inspection shall be available at every spray ground facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-3.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
